ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: that s not true.  i was in a group of 5, 2 rogues, a paladin, a shaman, and me. we had no problems camping the steel golem at level 30-35.  never lost anyone
ygData.messageBody:
that's not true. i was in a group of 5, 2 rogues, a paladin, a shaman, and
me.
we had no problems camping the steel golem at level 30-35. never lost anyone
to death.


At 10:00 PM 10/6/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Mike Lehr" <mike@...>
>
>

>ROFL, you'll never survive in Mistmoore, or lguk without a cleric or 2
>shamans/druids. Clerics are ESSENTIAL to groups, because w/o them the two
>other priests must save a lot of mana for healing.. This isn't as true at
>lower lvls, but it is so very true at upper levels. All groups NEED a
>cleric at upper levels..
>
>>
